title: Soldiers With Vases and a Litter
description: a piece from the Cycle of Tapestries woven for Marie de\' Medici, The Stories of Queen Artemisia, based on an epic account by Nicolas Houel; woven in the Faubourg Saint-Marcel manufactory of Marc de Comaus and Frauçois de la Planche between 1611 and 1627; warp undyed wool, 7-8½ ends per cm., weft dyed wool and silk, 28-36 ends per cm.
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
